document.full_text: washington scrambled on thursday to assess whether security had been compromised after google inc revealed a major hacker attack targeting u.s. officials that the internet giant pegged to china.
document.title: washington weighs security after "serious" google allegation
lines_and_colors: washington scrambled on thursday to assess whether security had been compromised after google inc revealed a major hacker attack targeting u.s. officials that the internet giant pegged to china.
